mutants.code:
def max_subarray_division_cost(n, k, A):
    suff = []
    sumi = 0
    for i in range(n - 1, 0, -1):
        sumi += A[i]
        suff.append(sumi)
    suff.sort(reverse=True)
    ans = sum(suff[:k - 1])
    ans -= sum(A)
    return ans

    return ans
